#summary Hackfodder-os was originally created with low level programmers in mind, it is an operating system (so far version 1.1 has one kernel module) that was designed to eliminate errors found when C programmers do not fully understand the compilers they use or the concept of compiling.

= Introduction =

Hackfodder-os was originally created with low level programmers in mind, it is an operating system (so far version 1.1 has one kernel module) that was designed to eliminate errors found when C programmers do not fully understand the compilers they use or the concept of compiling..
